HW5

Enum NetworkAdapter.MessageType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<NetworkAdapter.MessageType>
      • HW5.NetworkAdapter.MessageType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<NetworkAdapter.MessageType>
    Enclosing class:
    NetworkAdapter

    public static enum NetworkAdapter.MessageType
extends java.lang.Enum<NetworkAdapter.MessageType>
    Different type of game messages.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • CLOSE

        public static final NetworkAdapter.MessageType CLOSE
        Connection closed. To notify when the socket is closed.

      • COLOR

        public static final NetworkAdapter.MessageType COLOR

      • FILL

        public static final NetworkAdapter.MessageType FILL
        Request to fill a number in the board. This message has the form "fill: x,y,v", where x and y are 0-based column/row indexes of a square and v is a number to fill in the square.

      • FILL_ACK

        public static final NetworkAdapter.MessageType FILL_ACK
        Acknowledgement of a fill message. This message has the form "fill_ack: x,y,v", where x and y are 0-based column/row indexes of a square and v is a number to fill in the square.

      • JOIN

        public static final NetworkAdapter.MessageType JOIN
        Request to join. This message has the form "join:".

      • JOIN_ACK

        public static final NetworkAdapter.MessageType JOIN_ACK
        Acknowledgement of a join request. This message has the form "join_ack: n, [,size,board]", where n (response) is either 0 (declined) or 1 (accepted), size is the board size, and board is a sequence of non-empty squares of the board, each encoded as: x,y,v,f (where x, y: 0-based column/row indexes, v: number

      • MESSAGE

        public static final NetworkAdapter.MessageType MESSAGE

      • NAME

        public static final NetworkAdapter.MessageType NAME

      • NEW

        public static final NetworkAdapter.MessageType NEW
        Request to play a new game. This message has the form "new: size,board", size is the board size and board is a sequence of non-empty squares of the board, each encoded as: x,y,v,f (where x, y: 0-based column/row indexes, v: number, f: 1 if the value is given/fixed or 0 if entered by the user.

      • NEW_ACK

        public static final NetworkAdapter.MessageType NEW_ACK
        Acknowledgement of a new game request. This message has the form "new_ack: n", where n (response) is either 0 (declined) or 1 (accepted).

      • QUIT

        public static final NetworkAdapter.MessageType QUIT
        Quit the game. This message has the form "quit:".

      • UNKNOWN

        public static final NetworkAdapter.MessageType UNKNOWN
        Unknown message received.
